title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management and secure payment processing
longDescription: Built a comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring product catalog, shopping cart, order management, and integrated payment gateway. Implemented real-time inventory tracking and admin dashboard for business analytics.
highlights: Reduced checkout time by 40% through UX optimization
